info.name: ETSY Old Forums
info.description:
In January 2019, Etsy updated their forums and teams. Unfortunately this was difficult to use for promotions! But if you install this style, you can promote your shop just like before! The style looks almost exactly the same as the old Etsy Forums!

How to install:
1. Install Stylish plugin for Firefox or Chrome
2. Install this style

That's it! Have fun promoting!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.5b (Oct 6th, 2019)
-Hide the translate section under every post

Version 0.5a
-Brought back the comment menu, so you can edit or delete your messages. You can also report bad or spammy comments!
-Thread titles tweaked due to Etsy adjustment

Version 0.4b
-Force images posted in teams to be a more reasonable 160px in width, so it's less annoying to look through!
-Gradient tweak in the teams listing page

Version 0.4a
-Comment box is a placeholder, and re-clicking it several times due to buggy javascript is annoying. So this patch removes that junk, and shows the actual comment form directly!
-Some teams and forums feature way too many 'sticky' threads (threads that they've stuck at the top of the list). Normally this would be fine, except a duplicate also appears below them (causing people to double post!). This patch hides the sticky threads, so now it's easier to promote, without inadvertently posting twice!
-Hides the "By" author text, so it's easier for you to select and copy the name during promotes!

Version 0.3b
-Some teams feature "tags". These are annoying and have been removed.
-Added proper arrows next to avatar images, just as in the original.

Version 0.3a
-Forum listings now looks as close to the original as I could make it!
-Threads are now listed as close to each other as with the original forum layout, so it's faster to promote in teams!
-Multi-page links (next to the thread title) now features an easier to see link, so it's easier to click!

Version 0.2
-Corrected header avatar image
-Properly handled post information (name, user type, post date) so it works on multiple resolutions

Version 0.1
-Changed layout to generally the same feel and post distance for easier product promotions
